Name: Sunshine No. 1
Ingredients: 50 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of dehydrated pineapple slice wheel.
Garnish with dehydrated pineapple slice floated on surface.
Review: Light, fruity and heading a touch to the sweet side, but could well brighten up your day.
History: Adapted from a recipe in the 1949 edition of Esquire's Handbook for Hosts .
Nutrition: One serving of Sunshine No. 1 contains 197 calories
